column5: Just put a big "X" on the booth side, like we do on the boat side to mark the spot!!! Bill
It was nice talking to those of you that made it to the show. Hope you all have a good year on the water!

Had a nice chat with Scott and John at the Cedar Point Resort booth on Saturday. The show was pretty busy, the only one I go to any more. We shared the most secret of fishing spots, known only to those willing to take a blood oath to never divulge to others. Wrists will hopefully heal soon from the cuts! Bill
I think most are willing to take the knife!!(for a fish)
LOL it's healing quite well! Always a pleasure talking to you Bill. I hope to be up in september to learn how to catch crappie! And yes i will take those secret spots to my grave!!

If you’re around the Waterloo/ Cedar falls iowa area we will be at the show March15-17th representing Cedar Point Resort. Stop by and say hi as it’s nice to put a face to the name. We enjoy talking Canada, or fishing, or tackle, or favorite Canadian beers, or anything really. See y’all there!
I'll try to make it up, I missed chatting with you last fall. It is easy to miss out on bs time, when I do the cooking. Bill
The show this year (2020)will be 3-13 thru 3-15. Stop buy and say hi!
I'll try to make it. Bill
March 10-12 we will be at the show again this year representing the camp. Stop out and talk fishing Cedar with us.
I will try to make it to the March show, looking forward to it, Scott. Bill
I'll probably make the show and hopefully remember to stop by the Cedar Point Resort booth
I sure hope you make it Bill we have a lot of Bs'ing to do.
We are near dead center of the show this year in booth A44. Not the same booth as other years.
